Address.label: Address
Address.value: 495 SOUTH HIGH STREET,SUITE 50, COLUMBUS, Ohio, 43215, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Installed Building Products Inc is an insulation installer serving the residential new construction market. The company operates primarily in the United States. The company installs fiberglass insulation, spray foam insulation, and cellulose insulation. In addition to insulations, the company offers installation services for garage doors, rain gutters, closet shelving, shower doors, mirrors, waterproofing, fire-stopping, fireproofing, window blinds, and other products.
